text.div:
Codes for Healthcare Personnel Influenza Vaccination (HP FLU) Summary Data

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    86552-7 Staff [#] who worked at facility at least one day from October 1 through March 31
    86553-5 Staff [#] who received influenza vaccination at the facility
    86554-3 Staff [#] who provided documentation of influenza vaccine receipt
    86555-0 Staff [#] who had a medical contraindication to the influenza vaccine
    86556-8 Staff [#] who declined influenza vaccine
    86557-6 Staff [#] with unknown influenza vaccination status

name: Codes for Healthcare Personnel Influenza Vaccination (HP FLU) Summary Data
